scripts.postbuild: pnpm run pack:shared && pnpm run pack:player && pnpm run pack:core && pnpm run pack:epp
scripts.build:win: pnpm --filter './packages/*' build && cd apps/ezplayer-ui-electron && pnpm build:react && pnpm build:tsc && pnpm build:preload && pnpm electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: pnpm --filter './packages/*' build && cd apps/ezplayer-ui-electron && pnpm build:react && pnpm build:tsc && pnpm build:preload && pnpm electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:linux: pnpm --filter './packages/*' build && cd apps/ezplayer-ui-electron && pnpm build:react && pnpm build:tsc && pnpm build:preload && pnpm electron-builder --linux
scripts.pack:shared: cd packages/shared-ui-components && rm -rf dist/*.tgz && pnpm pack --pack-destination ./dist
scripts.pack:player: cd packages/player-ui-components && rm -rf dist/*.tgz && pnpm pack --pack-destination ./dist
scripts.pack:core: cd packages/ezplayer-core && rm -rf dist/*.tgz && pnpm pack --pack-destination ./dist
scripts.pack:epp: cd packages/epp && rm -rf dist/*.tgz && pnpm pack --pack-destination ./dist
